alert.note: Alert for Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 07 at 5:36PM CDT until July 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall that fell earlier today upstream from this location. * WHERE...A portion of south Texas, including the following county, Jim Wells. * WHEN...Until 830 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 533 PM CDT, Emergency management reported flooding with a report of a flooded vehicle in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... North West of Alice. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
